.. _`cs-taskmanager-web-details.components.LongText.__module__`:

========
LongText
========

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



Shows a text while preserving whitespace, such as line breaks.

React Properties
................

+----------+--------+---------+-----------------------+
| Property | Type   | Default | Use                   |
+==========+========+=========+=======================+
| text     | String | \-      | Text to be displayed. |
+----------+--------+---------+-----------------------+
